title: Rebecca Judd reveals that she wears leak-proof panties
text:
Rebecca Judd has revealed that she wears 'leak-proof' panties.

The mother-of-four said that the spring weather has given her hay fever, causing her to 'wee her pants' every time she sneezes.

Bec, 36, made the candid confession on KIIS FM's The 3pm Pick Up, revealing that her preferred brand of underwear is Modibodi.

So THAT's her secret! Rebecca Judd has revealed that she needs to wear leak-proof underwear because she urinates whenever she sneezes

Modibodi bills itself as 'the #1 period underwear & incontinence underwear brand'.

'From periods & discharge, light bladder leakage and weak pelvic floors​ ​to perspiration and pong, and pesky breastmilk leaks, we’ve got your back,' reads Modibodi's official website.

'It’s time to ditch your tampons, liners, and pads and join the Modibodi Movement with our sustainable, luxuriously comfy​ ​underwear & water repellent swimwear.'

Candid: Bec, 36, made the candid confession on KIIS FM's The 3pm Pick Up, revealing that her preferred brand of underwear is Modibodi

The WAG is also a fan of more glamorous underwear brands, including Victoria's Secret.

In a recent Instagram post, Bec sported a black Victoria's Secret push-up bra and matching leather skirt in a picture taken in a changing room.

The Postcards presenter tagged Victoria's Secret in the post, and remarked: 'How good are their push-up bras?!'

Designer: The WAG is also a fan of more glamorous underwear brands, including Victoria's Secret

Speaking to body+soul in July this year, Rebecca said she only exercises for two hours each week.

'I am addicted to cardio tennis, I play for two hours, twice a week because it's really fun. It's a total game changer.'

'There's no serving,' she continued. 'It's a cardio workout where the music blares, the coach just feeds you balls, you do awesome drills with lots of running and it's 60 minutes that goes so quickly.'
description: Rebecca Judd has revealed that she wears 'leak-proof' panties.
